title: Buckinghamshire: Met Office issues yellow weather warnings
description: The Met Office has issued a yellow weather warning for heavy rain across parts of the UK including Buckinghamshire from 5pm today (January 1) until 9pm tomorrow. A yellow weather warning for wind will also come into effect between 8am and 9pm on Tuesday (January 2), promising a wet and wild start to 2024.

title: Progress has been made on small boats, but there is a long way to go

They show the number of migrants crossing the Channel has fallen year-on-year for the first time since current records began.

title: Woman accused of murdering children in Colorado appears in UK court
description: A woman accused of murdering two of her children in the United States has appeared in a British court.
